      • getChildCount

        public int getChildCount(java.lang.Object parent)
        Description copied from class: FullTreeModel
        Return the number of children of the given parent. This is the number attributes, ports, relations, and contained entities, filtered by the filter specified by setFilter(), if any has been specified.
        Specified by:

      • isLeaf

        public boolean isLeaf(java.lang.Object node)
        Description copied from class: VisibleTreeModel
        Return true if the object is a leaf node. An object is a leaf node if it has no children that are instances of one of the classes specified by setFilter(), if a filter has been specified.
        Specified by:
        isLeaf in interface javax.swing.tree.TreeModel
        Overrides:
        isLeaf in class VisibleTreeModel
        Parameters:
        node - The object.
        Returns:
        True if the node has no children.

      • valueForPathChanged

        public void valueForPathChanged(javax.swing.tree.TreePath path,
                                java.lang.Object newValue)
        Description copied from class: VisibleTreeModel
        Override the base class to do nothing. This seems risky, but the problem is that without it, every time you expand a library that has a image or PDF icon it, the entire library collapses, which is extremely annoying. I guess this is OK under the assumption that the library does not change during execution.
        Specified by:
        valueForPathChanged in interface javax.swing.tree.TreeModel
        Overrides:
        valueForPathChanged in class VisibleTreeModel
        Parameters:
        path - The path of the node that has changed.
        newValue - The new value of the node.
